review: Quite patient to his patients. For any heart issue problems will recommend him to everyone. Neat & clean clinic,  positive atmosphere and courteous staff.

Wait time for the appointment was as mentioned. Doctor examined me clinically and even measured my BP on his own, which nowadays is rarely seen. He took a very careful clinical history and saw all the previous health records meticulously. The prescribed medications were explained and were easily available in the nearby pharmacy. I am optimistic that with the treatment, my BP would be in control with time. Thank you very much doctor.
Wonderful polite Doctor, dealt so nicely that yet to see another such a fine Doctor and person. Made me really comfortable.

Very unprofessional. I booked an appointment with the doctor using apollo 247 app for my mother when she complained of chest pain. Dr. Rajeeve suggested a few tests to diagnose the problem. After submitting the test reports on the app, there is no response from the doctor. I raised this to the apollo support team and since 3 days they are asking me to wait for 24 hours and then they asked me to book another appointment by paying another 1500 rupees. If this is about money, you can raise the consultation fee but don't play such mimics with the families of the patients who are already dealing with the pandemic. And, if it is not about the money, you should be responsible enough to not make the patients dealing with such serious illness wait for treatment
I have good feel after visit the clinic. All things are explained very neatly. Treet  me in good manner.
Dr. was not as what we had expected. The way of treatment is very simple. I would like to suggest they should know the patient history to give the better treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Life saver
Very nice friendly
Give time and listen to patient

Nice nice nice

Extremely professional and competent. Explained the problem in detail.  The doctor Is very knowledgeable and kind. Would strongly recommend consultation here.

Very friendly and Chherful nature .Lot of  knowledge and experience .. Highly recommended this doctor for heart diseases like BP ,high pulse ...Do go once and see it by yourself you will be satisfied with your releated problem...Mymothwr went to the clinic and found verygood response from doctors
